One such clue is the phrase "Hot Springs National Park, Ark." This phrase suggests the presence of a national park in Hot Springs, Arkansas, which is likely managed by the National Park Service (NPS), a federal agency within the United States Department of the Interior.

Therefore, we can infer that there may be individuals employed by the National Park Service who work at Hot Springs National Park, such as park rangers, visitor center staff, maintenance workers, or administrative personnel.
